name: AW Solutions
tag_list: fundwizard, hedge-funds, mutual-funds, etf, knowledge-management, fund-of-funds, investment-software, due-diligence, risk-management
overview:
AW Solutions is a Geneva based company offering expertise and advice in the area of financial asset management.

AW Solutions was founded with the objective of providing advice, consultation and software solutions in the area of financial asset management. Having spent many years as investment professionals, the partners have used leading hedge fund due diligence procedures and analytical techniques to offer clients advice on sound investments practices.

AW Solutions, creators of FundWizard, the essential investment software for banks, fund of funds, investment managers, and individuals alike. Whether it’s analyzing hedge funds, mutual funds or ETF’s, FundWizard can help create the definitive investment management solution.
